name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. MARCO ELECTRIC MANUFACTURING CORPORATION, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth v. Marco Electric Manufacturing Corp.

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. MARCO ELECTRIC MANUFACTURING CORPORATION, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Alan I. Baskin, Reading, for appellant.
Robert Patrick Coyne, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
428 A.2d 974
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. MARCO ELECTRIC MANUFACTURING CORPORATION, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 21, 1981.
Decided May 5, 1981.
Alan I. Baskin, Reading, for appellant.
Robert Patrick Coyne, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
